attributes.action: In an era of multi channel television, to abolish or adapt the obligatory tv licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have satellite television, with numerous channels. Why, having spent x amount on my satellite subscription must I also pay the obligatory licence/tax just for the privilege of watching tv? Can I not opt out of the bbc service and still watch tv?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
